message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $11,500. I believe it presents a great value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to save a bit more. What do you think?
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,900?
